metadata.title: 10 killed, 15 injured in Karak as truck collides with passenger vehicle

content.article_body: PESHAWAR, Jan 11 (APP):As many as 10 people were killed and 15 injured when a 22-wheeler truck fell onto a passenger vehicle at Ameri Kalay Chowk, Karak. According to the Deputy Commissioner of Karak, the incident occurred after the truckas brakes failed, causing it to crash into the passenger vehicle. Among the deceased were women and children. Rescue 1122 is conducting rescue operations, and hospitals have been placed on high alert to manage the situation.
content.summary: At least 10 people were killed and 15 injured when a truck crashed into a passenger vehicle at Ameri Kalay Chowk in Karak. The incident occurred after the truck's brakes failed, causing it to crash into the passenger vehicle. Rescue operations are underway, and hospitals have been placed on high alert.
